page.title: 12EVENTS
page.content: The opening of the {Bitterne Bypass}, named "Mowbray King Way" was an important event in 1984 in this eastern area of{Southampton}.Through { {traffic }on the main road from Portsmouth now passes to the north of Bitterne on a dual carriageway.The main street in {Bitterne}is now closed to traffic and is,in 1985,in the process of being converted into a { {pedestrian precinct}.Features of the precinct include a {new Church}and{ {supermarket}.Also opened in 1985 was the {Bitterne Leisure Centre}which includes a multi-use{sports hall}. An adjacent{swimming pool}is due for completion in 1986.Considerable disruption and inconvenience has been caused by this reconstruction in the 1980's but it is hoped that {Bitterne will now enjoy better facilities than ever before.
